description: This project follows a design from onset to end & shows textiles in various stages of design and correction…to the finished product.  Vertical branches with apples & leaves.  Design formed by using full warp & weft;  background is decreased. Clipped twice Cream/gold. Gold in weft creates gold apples. cream/silver
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Laura Foster Nicholson%2C Larsen Design Studio
medium: Linen weft/cotton warp.  Metallic in some pieces.
title: Apple Tree Project
